import sys
time=0
for line in sys.stdin:
    if time==0:
        time=1
        n=int(line.split()[0])
        k=int(line.split()[1])
        continue
    lst=[int(x) for x in line.split()]
#print(n,k)
lst=sorted(lst)[:3:]
#print(lst)
if(n%2==0 and len(lst)<3):
    print("Ginger666")
if(n%2==0 and len(lst)==3):
    print(n//2*(lst[0]+lst[1])-lst[1]+lst[2])
if(n%2==1):
    print(n//2*(lst[0]+lst[1])+lst[0])

n,k=map(int,input().split())
s=list(map(int,input().split()))
if k==1:
    print("Ginger666")
    exit()
s.sort()
print(s[0]*((n+1)//2)+s[1]*(n//2))

import sys
time=0
n=0
k=0
lst=[]
for line in sys.stdin:
    if time==0:
        time=1
        n=int(line.split()[0])
        k=int(line.split()[1])
        continue
    lst=[int(x) for x in line.split()]
#print(n,k)
lst=sorted(lst)
#print(lst)
if(k==1):
    print("Ginger666")
else:
    if(n%3==0):
        print(n//3*(2*lst[0]+lst[1]))
    else:
        print(n//3*(2*lst[0]+lst[1])+lst[1]+lst[0]*(n%3-1))

print(v)
